segments.text: Good morning , Miss.Are there boat tickets to Miami on the first of September
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there are . What cabin would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like the first-class cabin for two . What's the fare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long is the boat time-table effective ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The boat time-table is effective from the first of August till the first of November
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to know what port does our ship stop at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ship will stop at New York .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will the trip take from here to New York ?
segments.speaker: S1
